H0.text: In 1986 the prime minister of which European country was assassinated while returning home from the cinema. Italy

H1.text: In 1986 the prime minister of which European country was assassinated while returning home from the cinema. United Kingdom

H2.text: In 1986 the prime minister of which European country was assassinated while returning home from the cinema. France

H3.text: In 1986 the prime minister of which European country was assassinated while returning home from the cinema. SWEDEN

A4.text: Close to midnight on 28 February 1986, he was walking home from a cinema when he was shot.

A5.text: Olof Palme served as prime minister of Sweden from 1969 to 1976 and 1982 to 1986.
